Description:
Carry out heavy cleansing tasks and special projects.
Portray high efficiency in cleaning the existing facilities and rooms.
Clean the areas of items like glasses, spills, garbage, or any redundant material.
Complete all the prescribed routine activities and work on unique projects as per instructions.Skills
Skills:
Punctual, reliable and trustworthy.
Knowledge of safety regulations to maintain a secure workplace.
Adept in following a written protocol by understanding the cleanliness checklist.
Awareness of time and cleanliness requirements.
